HOT STONE MASSAGE

BY PRINCIPAL, LECTURER AND SALON OWNER MARILYN DUKE

Learn from a lecturer with over 30 years’ experience in the field and her own internationally accredited beauty therapy school, the application of a professional hot stone therapy massage.

This course offers detailed theory and practical classes on how to give a hot stone massage. You will learn how to select equipment, prepare your client and apply hot stone for a deeply relaxing and therapeutic massage. We will cover the history of hot stone and what makes basal stones special. I will help you to increase your revenue through correct cost structuring and increased client satisfaction which always translate in to repeat business and referrals. After going through the benefits and effects of hot stone we will go through the sequence for full body with video and auditory comments. The sequence is also available for you to download. The course will also take you through how to care for your client from consultation to hygiene and aftercare advice.

Course requirement

Course requirements include massage table, towels, hot stones & heater and massage oil.

No previous knowledge is required, this is an introductory course.

The content of this course includes Video Demonstrations and lessons , Sequence & theory notes are prepared as downloads, Quiz questions are included to test your knowledge and email feedback and comments are readily on hand for your learning experience.

The course is divided into 20 minutes lessons, with a ten minute quiz at the end. There are 6 lessons; an introduction and conclusion. The biggest time commitment is going to be practise of the massage to learn the sequence; I recommend a minimum of 10 massages performed on 2 clients who will give you loads of feedback on your pressure and rhythm. (Forms can be downloaded). Total time commitment of 3 ½ hours theory, 20 hours practical = 23 ½ hours to be on your way to professional hot stone massage.
title: Learn Hot stone Massage
